named-query.name: equalsString
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.name = 'Foo'

named-query.name: equalsBoolean
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.activated = true

named-query.name: between
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.amount between 99 and 110

named-query.name: greaterThan
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where b.amount > 100

named-query.name: inList
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.username in ('johndoe', 'janeroe')

named-query.name: tupleComparison
named-query.query: select u from User u where (u.firstname, u.lastname) in (('John', 'Doe'), ('Jane', 'Roe'))

named-query.name: componentComparison
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.homeAddress = ('Some Street 123', '12345', 'Some City')

named-query.name: enum
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.auctionType = org.jpwh.model.querying.AuctionType.HIGHEST_BID

named-query.name: isNull
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.buyNowPrice is null

named-query.name: isNotNull
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.buyNowPrice is not null

named-query.name: likeEnd
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.username like 'john%'

named-query.name: likeEndNot
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.username not like 'john%'

named-query.name: likeSubstring
named-query.query: select u from User u where u.username like '%oe%'

named-query.name: likeEscape
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.name like 'Name\_with\_underscores' escape :escapeChar

named-query.name: arithmetic
named-query.query: select b from Bid b where (b.amount / 2) - 0.5 > 49

named-query.name: logicalGroups
named-query.query: select i from Item i where (i.name like 'Fo%' and i.buyNowPrice is not null) or i.name = 'Bar'

named-query.name: functionsLower
named-query.query: select i from Item i where lower(i.name) like 'ba%'

named-query.name: collectionNotEmpty
named-query.query: select c from Category c where c.items is not empty

named-query.name: memberOf
named-query.query: select c from Category c where :item member of c.items

named-query.name: collectionSize
named-query.query: select c from Category c where size(c.items) > 1

named-query.name: functionsDateDiff
named-query.query: select i from Item i where function('DATEDIFF', 'DAY', i.createdOn, i.auctionEnd) > 1

named-query.name: functionsDateDiffHibernate
named-query.query: select i from Item i where datediff('DAY', i.createdOn, i.auctionEnd) > 1

named-query.name: orderbyUsername
named-query.query: select u from User u order by u.username

named-query.name: orderbyUsernameDesc
named-query.query: select u from User u order by u.username desc

named-query.name: orderby
named-query.query: select u from User u order by u.activated desc, u.username asc
